CIRCULAR  NO.  24/  2003 
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of the Bureau that visitors are allowed 
beyond the visitors area and at times they go upto Immigration area in departure 
terminal of the airport. The segregation point meant for restricting the entry of 
visitors is manned at some airports by traffic wardens of AAI and not by CISF. 
Touts and some other undesirable elements are taking advantage of it and 
thereby indulging in illegal activities inside the airport. This lacuna  can also be 
exploited by terrorists / perpetrators for unlawful interference with civil aviation 
operations and therefore has serious implications from security point of view.  
 
2. 
In view of the above, it has been decided that the traffic wardens 
deployed at segregation point in pax terminal building of airports shall be 
withdrawn and replaced by  CISF personnel forthwith.  
 
3. 
Necessary action in this regard may please be taken under 
intimation to this Bureau immediately.  
 
 
 
(R.C. Tayal) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 
Ref : No. CAS-7(15)/2003.DIV-1 dated 21 Aug 2003
